name: NeuroDancer
description: Want to see some naked women? Then you are part of the target audience of this game. The premise: the NeuroNET features three NeuroDancers who are eager to remove their clothes for you. But like in real life they want to see credits for it. To earn these credits you have to hack the NeuroNET by solving a 3D maze. But when you achieved your goal the interactivity doesn't stop! No, you can use a virtual hand to click her shirt off even faster!

shot.caption: Intro film. Our future hacker is feeling a little... anxious.
Luckily, this lady's sweater is oh-so-uncomfortable...
Title screen.
This hacker explains the game.  Hack panels. Get money.
Some goofy side vids offer more than just nudie time.
Cheese it!  It's a call from the space cops!
Infomercial on one of the "channels"
The group X-Calibur in their music video for the game.
Sending your probe out to hack.  Wait... probing a tunnel... I get it!
The "maze" is incredibly easy. I guess they're expecting the blood's not flowing to your brain.
Activate the arm at these panels to download credits.
Stay connected to a panel too long, and it's game over.
Probe returns with the cash. Let's spend it unwisely.
Call up NeuroDancer and pick one of the three girls.
Each girl gets a profile.
We've got cash, so the holo-tank dancing begins.
Point the hand at what you want taken off.
A new video clip loads where the dancer complies.
Somehow, you'll never have enough money for those panties.
Katara agrees to dance for us. Wasn't she in Mortal Kombat?
All ready for clubbing, apparently.
Duuurrr... take THAT off!
Kim informs us to hold on for a bumpy ride.  If you say so.
All white girls dance like their at weddings.  Amirite?
Click the stuff, get a video of her taking it off and dancing badly. You get the idea.
